cause.description:
this card game needs more effort than existing Olympic games..... it needs concentration plus it enhances ur capability to think and read a person's mentality and personality.... its more than a card game!!!!
ps: if we succeed lebanon will be presented by its national varsity which is currently holding 4 players : Mr. Uday mezher ( me) , Mr. Nizam madi , Mr. Bernard kalaani , and Mr. Mhammad kbar......
1. IT IS A CATASTROPHY THAT ILKHA ISNT CONSIDERED AS AN OLYMPIC GAME!!!!
2. LEABNON HAS A BIG CHANCE OF GETTING THE GOLD MEDAL WITH THE CURRENT PLAYERS IN ACTION !! :p
cause.mission: LETS MAKE LIKHA AN OLYMPIC GAME!!!
cause.name: OLYMPIFYING LIKHA!!!
